name: Robert McCaffery
tagline: Developer, Analyst, Culinary Enthusiast, Ukulele Aficionado
body:
### Personal projects
* [Weekly Apps](http://weeklyapps.github.io/) - [Source](https://github.com/WeeklyApps/weeklyapps.github.io)
* [Weekly Apps Blog](http://weeklyappsblog.com/) - [Source](https://github.com/WeeklyApps/blog)
* [This page's source](https://github.com/robmc/robmc.github.io)
* [Ruby on Rails Calendar](http://cal.robertjmccaffery.com) (still in development)

### Professional projects
* [ICRAS](http://paperworkreduction.gov/)
* [DARMIS](http://darmis.ctacorp.com/authentication/index)
* [Healthcare Finder](http://finder.healthcare.gov/) (Video of President Obama demoing Healthcare Finder found [here](http://www.whitehouse.gov/blog/2010/07/28/not-your-ordinary-website-demo))
* [FAQ](http://answers.healthcare.gov/)
* HHS Clearance (no public URL)
* HHS Innovations (no public URL)
* HHS Breach - Public URL: [ocrnotifications.hhs.gov](http://ocrnotifications.hhs.gov) - Admin URL is not public
* DNS Tracker (no public URL)
* Press Release (no public URL)
* [HHS WCD File Transfer System](https://filetransfer.hhs.gov/filetransfer/)

### Languages
* Ruby on Rails
* JavaScript
* jQuery
* HTML
* CSS

### Skills
* System Administration
* SDLC
* Linux
* ยง 508 and other standards of Accessibility compliance (CVAA, WCAG, etc.)
* Agile / Scrum
* Git / Subversion
* Virtual Machines
* Business Analysis
* Project Management
* Public Speaking

### Professional Organizations
* [DC Tech Meetup](http://www.meetup.com/DC-Tech-Meetup/) - Member
* [DevOpsDC](http://www.meetup.com/DevOpsDC/) - Member
* [DC Ruby Users Group (DCRUG)](http://www.meetup.com/dcruby/) - Member
* League of Professional System Administrators (LOPSA) - Charter Member and Speaker
    * Main website: [https://lopsa.org/](https://lopsa.org/)
    * DC chapter website: [http://lopsadc.org/](http://lopsadc.org/)

### Find me on
* [LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/in/robertmccaffery)
* [GitHub](https://github.com/robmc)
* [Flickr](http://www.flickr.com/photos/robertmccaffery/sets/)

### Education
* Master of Business Administration - 2008 - Christian Brothers University
* Graduate Certificate of Information Technology - 2008 - Christian Brothers University
* Bachelor of Science in Business Administration - 2007 - Christian Brothers University
    * Major - Information Technology Management
